TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city in 1025AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Faire de Constantinople la ville la plus peuplée et cultivée en 1025 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Das Zweite Rom:[COLOR_REVERT] Macht 1025 n.Chr. Konstantinopel zur kulturell bedeutendsten und größten Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Seconda Roma:[COLOR_REVERT] Rendi Costantinopoli la città più grande e con più cultura nel 1025AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city in 1025AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Segunda Roma:[COLOR_REVERT] Torne Constantinopla a maior cidade em população e possuidora da maior cultura em 1025DC

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Keep or reconquer Constantinople, Thrace, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Colonea, Antiochia, Charsianon, Cilicia, Armeniakon, Anatolikon, Paphlagonia, Thrakesion and Opsikion in 1282AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Keep or reconquer Constantinople, Thrace, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Colonea, Antiochia, Charsianon, Cilicia, Armeniakon, Anatolikon, Paphlagonia, Thrakesion and Opsikion in 1282AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Wiederbelebung des Römischen Glanzes:[COLOR_REVERT] Behaltet oder erobert bis 1282 n.Chr. Konstantinopel, Thrace, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Colonea, Antiochia, Charsianon, Kilikien, Armeniakon, Anatolikon, Paphlagonia, Thrakesion und Opsikion.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Rivivere la Gloria di Roma:[COLOR_REVERT] Mantieni o riconquista le province di Costantinopoli, Thrace, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Colonea, Antiochia, Charsianon, Cilicia, Armeniakon, Paflagonia, Thrakesion e Opsikion nel 1282AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Keep or reconquer Constantinople, Thrace, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Colonea, Antiochia, Charsianon, Cilicia, Armeniakon, Anatolikon, Paphlagonia, Thrakesion and Opsikion in 1282AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Revivendo a Glória Romana:[COLOR_REVERT] Mantenha ou reconquiste Constantinopla, Thrace, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Colonea, Antioquia, Charsianon, Cilícia, Armeniakon, Anatólico, Paflagônia, Thrakesion and Opsikion em 1282DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Crossroads of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Crossroads of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Etre l'Empire le plus riche du monde en 1453 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Wegkreuzung der Welt:[COLOR_REVERT] Seid bis 1453 n.Chr. das wohlhabendste Reich.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Crocevia del Mondo:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi essere la civiltà più ricca nel 1453AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Crossroads of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Crossroads of the World: Be the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Encruzilhada do Mundo:[COLOR_REVERT] Torne-se o império mais rico do mundo em 1453DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgarien an Drei Meeren:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 917 n.Chr. Moesia, Thrace, Makedonien, Serbien, Arberia, Thessaloniki und Konstantinopel.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria sui Tre Mari:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla contemporaneamente le province di Moesia, Tracia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Salonicco e Costantinopoli entro il 971AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria em Três Mares:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Mésia, Trácia, Macedônia, Sérvia, Arberia, Thessalonica and Constantinopla até 917DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Der Beginn der Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Sammelt bis 1259 n.Chr. mindestens 100 orthodoxe Glaubenspunkte.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]L'Inizio del Rinascimento:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumula almeno 100 Punti Fede Ortodossi entro il 1259AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]O Começo da Renascença:[COLOR_REVERT] Acumule pelo menos 100 Pontos de Fé Ortodoxa até 1259DC

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city to barbarians (Mongols), Byzantines, or Ottomans before 1393AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Ne perdre aucune ville par les Mongoles, les Byzantins ou les Ottomans avant 1393 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Nicht Einmal Vögel Können es Durchqueren:[COLOR_REVERT] Verliert vor 1393 n.Chr. keine Stadt an die Barbaren (Mongolen), die Byzantiner oder Osmanen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Neanche gli uccelli possono attraversare le nostre mura:[COLOR_REVERT] Non farti conquistare nessuna città da Mongoli (Barbari), Bizantini o Ottomani prima del 1393AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city to barbarians (Mongols), Byzantines, or Ottomans before 1393AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Nem Mesmo os Pássaros Conseguem Passar:[COLOR_REVERT] Não perca cidades para os bárbaros (Mongóis), Bizantinos, ou Otomanos antes de 1393DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Imperium des Westens:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 840 n.Chr. Ile-De-France, Picardie, Aquitanien, Provence, Burgund, Orleans, Champagne, Lothringen, Katalonien, Lombardei, Toskana, Schwaben und Sachsen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Impero Occidentale:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla le province di Ile-De-France, Piccardia, Aquitania, Provenza, Borgogna, Orleans, Champagne, Lorena , Catalogna, Lombardia, Toscana, Svevia e Sassonia nel 840AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Império do Oeste:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Ilha de França, Picardia, Aquitânia, Provença, Borgonha, Orleans, Champagne, Lorena, Catalunha, Lombardia, Toscana, Suábia e Saxônia até 840DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Jerusalem in 1291AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Capturer Jérusalem en 1291 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Imperium des Heiligen Landes:[COLOR_REVERT] Kontrolliert 1291 n.Chr. Jerusalem.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Impero della Terra Santa:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla Gerusalemme nel 1291AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Jerusalem in 1291AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Império da Terra Santa:[COLOR_REVERT] Controle Jerusalém em 1291DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 6 Colonial Projects.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Construire 6 Projets Coloniaux.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Imperium der Welt:[COLOR_REVERT] Errichtet 6 Kolonien.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Impero del Mondo:[COLOR_REVERT] Costruisci 6 Progetti Coloniali.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Conseguir una cultura superior a 5.000 en el 450 d. C. (turno 143)
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Império do Mundo:[COLOR_REVERT] Construa 6 Projetos Coloniais.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 10,000 culture points by 1336AD. (Great Artists don't count)
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 10,000 culture points by 1336AD. (Great Artists don't count)
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Burgunder Art zu Leben:[COLOR_REVERT] Erzeugt bis 1336 n.Chr. 10.000 Kulturpunkte. (Große Künstler zählen nicht)
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lo Stile di Vita Borgognone:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi aver prodotto almeno 10,000 punti cultura entro il 1336AD. (Senza usare grandi Artisti)
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 10,000 culture points by 1336AD. (Great Artists don't count)
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Estilo de vida Burgúndio:[COLOR_REVERT] Produza 10.000 pontos de cultura até 1336DC. (Grandes Artistas não contam)

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Wiedervereinigung:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 1376 n.Chr. Burgund, Provence, Picardie, Flandern, Champagne und Lothringen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Riunificazione:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla le province di Borgogna, Provenza, Piccardia, Fiandre, Champagne e Lorena nel 1376AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunificação:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Borgonha, Provença, Picardia, Flandres, Champagne e Lorena em 1376DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Macht im Westen:[COLOR_REVERT] Erreicht 1473 n.Chr. eine höhere Punktzahl als Frankreich, England und Deutschland.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Potenza dell'Occidente:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi avere il punteggio più alto di Francia, Inghilterra e Germania nel 1473AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Potência Ocidental:[COLOR_REVERT] Tenha uma colocação (score) melhor que França, Inglaterra e Alemanha em 1473DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Sword of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Arabia, Syria, Lebanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia and Egypt in 955AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Sword of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Arabia, Syria, Lebanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia and Egypt in 955AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Das Schwert des Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 955 n.Chr. Arabien, Syrien, Libanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia und Ägypten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Spada dell'Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquista le province di Arabia, Siria, Libano, Gerusalemme, Antiochia ed Egitto entro il 955AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Sword of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Arabia, Syria, Lebanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia and Egypt in 955AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Espada do Islã:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Arábia, Síria, Líbano, Jerusalém, Antioquia e Egito em 955DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Arabia, Syria, Lebanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia, Egypt, Tripolitania, Algiers, Ifriqiya, Cyrenaica and Oran in 1291AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Arabia, Syria, Lebanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia, Egypt, Tripolitania, Algiers, Ifriqiya, Cyrenaica and Oran in 1291AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Das Haus des Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 1291 n.Chr. Arabien, Syrien, Libanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia, Ägypten, Tripolitania, Algier, Ifriqiya, Kyrenaika und Oran.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Sede dell'Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquista le province di Arabia, Siria, Libano, Gerusalemme, Antiochia, Egitto, Tripolitania, Algeri, Ifriqiya, Cirenaica ed Orano entro il 1291AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Arabia, Syria, Lebanon, Jerusalem, Antiochia, Egypt, Tripolitania, Algiers, Ifriqiya, Cyrenaica and Oran in 1291AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Casa do Islã:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Arábia, Síria, Líbano, Jerusalém, Antioquia, Egito, Tripolitânia, Argel, Ifriqiya, Cirenaica, e Orã em 1282DC

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Islam to spread to 35% of all people.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Répandre l'Islam à 35% dans le monde.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Welt des Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Sorgt für eine 35%-ige Verbreitung des Islam.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Spada dell'Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Diffondi l'Islam nel 35% delle città europee.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Islam to spread to 35% of all people.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]O Mundo do Islã:[COLOR_REVERT] Espalhe o Islã para 35% da população total.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Cordoba the largest city in the world in 961AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Faire de Courdoue la ville la plus peuplée du monde en 961 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Juwel der Welt:[COLOR_REVERT] Macht Cordoba 961 n.Chr. zur größten Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Gioiello del Mondo:[COLOR_REVERT] Cordoba deve essere la città più grande del mondo nel 961AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Cordoba the largest city in the world in 961AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Jóia do Mundo:[COLOR_REVERT] Faça Córdoba ser a cidade mais populosa do mundo em 961DC

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Build the Alhambra, the Gardens of Al-Andalus, and La Mezquita by 1309AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Construire l'Alhambra, les Jardins d'Al-Andalus et La Mezquita en 1309 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Überragende Architektur der Mauren:[COLOR_REVERT] Errichtet bis 1309 n.Chr. die Wunder Alhambra, die Gärten von Al-Andalus und Mezquita-Catedral.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Superiorità dell'Architettura Moresca:[COLOR_REVERT] Costruisci l'Alhambra, i Giardini di Al-Andalus e La Mezquita entro il 1309AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Build the Alhambra, the Gardens of Al-Andalus, and La Mezquita by 1309AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Arquiteture Superior Moura:[COLOR_REVERT] Construa Alhambra, os Jardins de Al-Andalus, e La Mezquita até 1309DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Have Islam spread in every city in Andalusia, Galicia, Leon, Castile, Navarre, Lusitania, Catalonia, Aragon, La Mancha and Valencia in 1492AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Have Islam spread in every city in Andalusia, Galicia, Leon, Castile, Navarre, Lusitania, Catalonia, Aragon, La Mancha and Valencia in 1492AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah von Iberien:[COLOR_REVERT] Verbreitet bis 1492 n.Chr. den Islam in allen Städten in Andalusien, Galicien, Leon, Kastilien, Navarre, Lusitania, Katalonien, Aragon, La Mancha und Valencia.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah d'Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] L'Islam deve essere presente in ogni città nelle province di Andalusia, Galizia, Leòn, Castiglia, Navarra, Lusitania, Catalogna, Aragona, La Mancha e Valencia nel 1492AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Have Islam spread in every city in Andalusia, Galicia, Leon, Castile, Navarre, Lusitania, Catalonia, Aragon, La Mancha and Valencia in 1492AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah da Ibéria:[COLOR_REVERT] Garanta a presença do Islã em todas cidades em Andaluzia, Galicia, Leão, Castela, Navarra, Lusitânia, Catalunha, Aragão, Mancha e Valência em 1492DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Catholicism the only religion in the Iberian peninsula, and spread catholicism to all the cities in Andalusia, Galicia, Castile, Leon, Lusitania, Catalonia, Aragon, Navarre, La Mancha and Valencia in 1492AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Catholicism the only religion in the Iberian peninsula, and spread catholicism to all the cities in Andalusia, Galicia, Castile, Leon, Lusitania, Catalonia, Aragon, Navarre, La Mancha and Valencia in 1492AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Macht Katholizismus zur alleinigen Religion auf der Iberischen Halbinsel und verbreitet bis 1492 n.Chr. den katholischen Glauben in allen Städten in Andalusien, Galicien, Kastilien, Leon, Lusitania, Katalonien, Aragon, Navarre, La Mancha und Valencia.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Rendi il Cattolicesimo l'unica religione presente nella penisola Iberica, e diffondilo in tutte le città delle province di Andalusia, Galizia, Castiglia, Leòn, Lusitania, Catalogna, Aragona, La Mancha e Valencia nel 1492AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Catholicism the only religion in the Iberian peninsula, and spread catholicism to all the cities in Andalusia, Galicia, Castile, Leon, Lusitania, Catalonia, Aragon, Navarre, La Mancha and Valencia in 1492AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Faça do Catolicismo a única religião presente na Península Ibérica, e espalhe o catolicismo para todas as cidades em Andaluzia, Galicia, Castela, Leão, Lusitânia, Catalunha, Aragão, Navarra, Mancha e Valência em 1492DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Have most Colonies in 1588AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Have most Colonies in 1588AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Spanische Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Besitzt 1588 n.Chr. die meisten Kolonien.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]L'Invincibile Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi avere più colonie di tutti nel 1588AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Have most Colonies in 1588AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Armada Espanhola:[COLOR_REVERT] Tenha mais colônias que qualquer outro em 1588DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Ensure that the Catholic nations have more population and more land than any other religion in 1648AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Ensure that the Catholic nations have more population and more land than any other religion in 1648AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Verteidiger des katholischen Europas:[COLOR_REVERT] Stellt sicher dass 1648 n.Chr. die katholischen Nationen eine größere Bevölkerung und mehr Land besitzen als irgendeine andere Religion.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Difensore dell'Europa Cattolica:[COLOR_REVERT] Assicurati che le nazioni Cattoliche abbiano più popolazione e più territorio complessivi di ogni altra religione nel 1648AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Ensure that the Catholic nations have more population and more land than any other religion in 1648AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defensor da Europa Católica:[COLOR_REVERT] Assegure que as nações católicas tenham mais população e território que qualquer outra religião em 1648DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Adriatic Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Verona, Dalmatia, Arberia and Epirus by 1004AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Adriatic Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Verona, Dalmatia, Arberia and Epirus by 1004AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominanz der Adria:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 1004 n.Chr. Verona, Dalmatien, Arberia und Epirus.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominio sull'Adriatico:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquista le provincie di Veneto, Dalmazia, Arberia ed Epiro entro il 1004AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Mediterranean Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople by 1204AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Mediterranean Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople by 1204AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the World Ocean:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to build a Colonial Project.

TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominação do Oceano Mundial:[COLOR_REVERT] Seja o primeiro a construir um Projeto Colonial.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lavra:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 2 Orthodox cathedrals and 8 Orthodox monasteries by 1250AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lavra:[COLOR_REVERT] Construire 2 Cathédrales et 8 Monastères Orthodoxe en 1250 ap.JC.

TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lavra[COLOR_REVERT] Construa 2 Catedrais Ortodoxas e 8 Mosteiros Ortodoxos até 1250DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Rulers of the northern Black Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer 10 provinces from Kiev, Podolia, Pereyaslavl, Sloboda, Chernigov, Volhynia, Minsk, Polotsk, Smolensk, Murom, Rostov, Novgorod and Vologda in 1288AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Rulers of the northern Black Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer 10 provinces from Kiev, Podolia, Pereyaslavl, Sloboda, Chernigov, Volhynia, Minsk, Polotsk, Smolensk, Murom, Rostov, Novgorod and Vologda in 1288AD.

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominatore del Mar Nero settentrionale:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla 10 province tra le seguenti: Kiev, Podolia, Pereyaslavl, Sloboda, Chernihiv, Volinia, Minsk, Polack, Smolensk, Murom, Rostov, Novgorod e Vologda nel 1288AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Fertile Black Soil:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 20000 food by 1300AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Fertile Black Soil:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 20000 food by 1300AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Fruchtbare Schwarzerde:[COLOR_REVERT] Erzeugt bis 1300 n.Chr. 20000 Nahrung.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lithuanian Commonwealth:[COLOR_REVERT] Have at least 18 cities in 1569AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lithuanian Commonwealth:[COLOR_REVERT] Have at least 18 cities in 1569AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Domination of Eastern Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer or Vassalize Moscow.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Allow no Ottoman cities in Wallachia, Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Thessaloniki, Thessaly, Morea, Epirus, Arberia, Serbia, Banat, Bosnia, Dalmatia and Slavonia in 1444AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Allow no Ottoman cities in Wallachia, Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Thessaloniki, Thessaly, Morea, Epirus, Arberia, Serbia, Banat, Bosnia, Dalmatia and Slavonie in 1444AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Verteidiger Europas:[COLOR_REVERT] Gestattet 1444 n.Chr. keine osmanischen Städte in Walachei, Moesia, Thrace, Makedonien, Thessaloniki, Thessaly, Morea, Epirus, Arberia, Serbien, Banaten, Bosnien, Dalmatien und Slawonien.

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Allow no Ottoman cities in Wallachia, Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Thessaloniki, Thessaly, Morea, Epirus, Arberia, Serbia, Banat, Bosnia, Dalmatia and Slavonia in 1444AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Black Army:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the most territory in Europe in 1490AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Black Army:[COLOR_REVERT] Avoir le plus gand territoire d'Europe en 1490 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Schwarze Armee:[COLOR_REVERT] Kontrolliert 1490 n.Chr. das größte Gebiet Europas.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Esercito Nero:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi essere la nazione più grande d'Europa nel 1490AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Black Army:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the most territory in Europe in 1490AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Exército Negro:[COLOR_REVERT] Controle o maior território na Europa em 1490DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Edict of Torda:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to adopt Free Religion.

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Edict of Torda:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to adopt Free Religion.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Holy Roman Empire:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Lorraine, Swabia, Saxony, Bavaria, Franconia, Brandenburg, Holstein, Lombardy and Tuscany in 1167AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reformation:[COLOR_REVERT] Found Protestantism.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reformation:[COLOR_REVERT] Found Protestantism.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Reformation:[COLOR_REVERT] Begründet den Protestantismus.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Riforma:[COLOR_REVERT] Fonda il Protestantesimo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reformation:[COLOR_REVERT] Found Protestantism.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Thirty-Year War:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Swabia, Saxony, Bavaria, Franconia, Brandenburg, Holstein, Flanders, Pomerania, Silesia, Bohemia, Moravia and Austria in 1648AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Thirty-Year War:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Swabia, Saxony, Bavaria, Franconia, Brandenburg, Holstein, Flanders, Pomerania, Silesia, Bohemia, Moravia and Austria in 1648AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Der Dreißigjährige Krieg:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 1648 n.Chr. Schwaben, Sachsen, Bayern, Franken, Brandenburg, Holstein, Flandern, Pommern, Schlesien, Böhmen, Mähren und Österreich.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Granary of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce the most food at least one year between 1500 and 1520 AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Granary of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce the most food at least one year between 1500 and 1520 AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Kornkammer Europas:[COLOR_REVERT] Produziert zwischen 1500 und 1520 n.Chr. mindestens ein Jahr lang die meiste Nahrung.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Commonwealth:[COLOR_REVERT] Own at least 12 cities in Bohemia, Moravia, Upper Hungary, Prussia, Lithuania, Livonia, Polotsk, Minsk, Volhynia, Podolia, Moldova and Kiev provinces in 1600AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Commonwealth:[COLOR_REVERT] Own at least 12 cities in Bohemia, Moravia, Upper Hungary, Prussia, Lithuania, Livonia, Polotsk, Minsk, Volhynia, Podolia, Moldova and Kiev provinces in 1600AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Golden Liberty:[COLOR_REVERT] Construct 3 Catholic and Orthodox Cathedrals, 2 Protestant Cathedrals, and have at least 2 Jewish Quarters in your cities.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Golden Liberty:[COLOR_REVERT] Construct 3 Catholic and Orthodox Cathedrals, 2 Protestant Cathedrals, and have at least 2 Jewish Quarters in your cities.

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Libertà Dorata:[COLOR_REVERT] Costruisci 3 Cattedrali Cattoliche ed Ortodosse, 2 Cattedrali Protestanti, inoltre devi avere almeno 2 Quartieri Ebrei nelle tue città.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Golden Liberty:[COLOR_REVERT] Construct 3 Catholic and Orthodox Cathedrals, 2 Protestant Cathedrals, and have at least 2 Jewish Quarters in your cities.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Homeland:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure there are no Mongol (Barbarian) cities in Moscow, Donets, Kuban, Zaporizhia, Sloboda, Kiev, Moldova, Crimea, Pereyaslavl, Chernigov, Simbirsk, Nizhny Novgorod, Vologda, Rostov, Novgorod, Karelia, Smolensk, Polotsk, Minsk, Volhynia, Podolia and Murom in 1482AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Homeland:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure there are no Mongol (Barbarian) cities in Moscow, Donets, Kuban, Zaporizhia, Sloboda, Kiev, Moldova, Crimea, Pereyaslavl, Chernigov, Simbirsk, Nizhny Novgorod, Vologda, Rostov, Novgorod, Karelia, Smolensk, Polotsk, Minsk, Volhynia, Podolia and Murom in 1482AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Das Vaterland:[COLOR_REVERT] Sorgt dafür dass 1482 n.Chr. keine mongolischen (barbarischen) Städte in Moskau, Donets, Kuban, Saporischschaja, Sloboda, Kiev, Moldawien, Krim, Pereyaslawl, Tschernigow, Simbirsk, Nischni Nowgorod, Vologda, Rostov, Nowgorod, Karelien, Smolensk, Polotsk, Minsk, Wolhynien, Podolia und Murom sind.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Respublica Superiorem Non Recognoscens:[COLOR_REVERT] Contrôler la Sardaigne, Milan, Chypre et la Crète en 1540 ap.JC.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Bank of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Fonder 2 Sociétés Commerciale et construire 8 Banques.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Trade above everything else:[COLOR_REVERT] Have the largest total amount of commerce from foreign Trade Route Exports and Imports in 1640AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Trade above everything else:[COLOR_REVERT] Have the largest total amount of commerce from foreign Trade Route Exports and Imports in 1640AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Crown:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer London, Wessex, East Anglia, Mercia, Northumbria, Scotland, Wales, Ireland, Normandy, Picardy, Bretagne, Il-de-France, Aquitania and Orleans in 1452AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Inventors of the Crown:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to enter the Industrial age.

TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Inventores da Coroa:[COLOR_REVERT] Seja o primeiro a entrar na Era Industrial.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Navigators:[COLOR_REVERT] Settle 3 cities on the Azores, Canaries and Madeira and 2 in Morocco, Tetouan and Oran.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defense leads to glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city before 1640AD.

TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Defesa Leva à Glória:[COLOR_REVERT] Não perca nenhuma cidade antes de 1640DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Osman's Empire:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople, Thrace, Macedonia, Thessaloniki, Moesia, Arberia, Epirus, Thessaly, Morea, Bosnia, Banat and Serbia in 1453AD.
